{"id":973848806,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"5Â months","timestamp":1687068277,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"126 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/973848806/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the Value of the Partition","memory":"59.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int findValueOfPartition(vector<int>& nums) {\n        sort(nums.begin(),nums.end());\n        int ans=INT_MAX;\n        for(int i=1;i<nums.size();i++){\n            if(nums[i]-nums[i-1]<ans){\n                ans=nums[i]-nums[i-1];\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-value-of-the-partition","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
